meanings.definition: The flowers of a plant, especially of a fruit tree.
meanings.sent1: In spring, the apple tree blossoms with beautiful pink flowers.
meanings.sent2: The cherry blossoms in the park are a sight to behold.
meanings.sent3: The bees buzz happily around the fragrant blossoms in the garden.
meanings.sent4: Her talent for painting blossoms into vibrant life on the canvas.
meanings.sent5: The delicate petals of the blossoms danced in the gentle breeze.

meanings.definition: To come into full development; mature.
meanings.sent1: With hard work, his business slowly blossoms into a success.
meanings.sent2: The friendship between the two children blossoms over time.
meanings.sent3: The small seed of an idea blossoms into a grand plan.
meanings.sent4: Her confidence blossoms as she faces and overcomes challenges.
meanings.sent5: Under the warm sun, the garden blossoms with life and color.
